channel.title: Help with chat filter
channel.description:
alright.. for some reason i got reported for putting a question on the question thread.. imagine that.. ^.^ but anyways, can any of you tell me hwo to turn off the chat filter in funscap3, or change the words it blocks? thx if you can
-Liam

item.title: Help with chat filter
item.dc:creator: @legend_rene legend rene
item.description:
@legend_rene wrote:

Look for a file named , censor or something that looks like a chatfiler , and delete it , search in client.java also and remove where the name of the file is.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with chat filter
item.dc:creator: @Khasck Khasck
item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

1.) it is open-source
2.) i thought it was client related?
but ohwell…
anyone tlel me how to do this?
[br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2007, 04:03:46 PM[/size][hr]no one can tell me how to turn off or change the chat filter words in funscap3 source?
your kidding me?

some one help me please…
your help is much appreciated…

-Liam[br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2007, 08:38:36 PM[/size][hr]please… anyone?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with chat filter
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

  1. You can only post questions about CLIENTS in the question section of the forums.

  2. If it’s not an Open-Source client, you can’t. :]

Read full topic
